Event: Kidney Stones again  What did I ever do to deserve this kind of pain, not once or twice but five times in my life??? Took drugs, peace out
Post: "I've been through it all—the agony, the fear, and the disappointment. For the fifth time in my life, I'm battling kidney stones. What did I do to deserve this? Is it my fault for not drinking enough water? Did I eat too much junk food? Or is it simply a curse? It's challenging to keep optimistic when life repeatedly throws me the same excruciating challenge. But, as always, I'll grit my teeth and bear it because that's what life demands of me."

Event: I will miss my City when we leave...priciness, pollution, panhandlers and all

The thought of leaving behind the familiar sights and sounds, the bustling streets, and the endless opportunities is almost too much to bear. But as I reflect on my time here, I'm forced to confront the reality that maybe I'm just not cut out for city living. Maybe I'm too sensitive, too weak, or too naive to handle the fast-paced, dog-eat-dog world of the city. Or maybe, just maybe, I'm simply not good enough."
